ModMetaData.name: Verify Start
ModMetaData.author: theubie / lorki97
ModMetaData.description:
A mod that checks your colonists stats before you press the button to start your adventure.
Originally made by TheUbie
Updated to B18 by lorki97
[Version 1.1.5]
Changelog:
1.1.5: - Fixed Lock/Ignore Button 1.1.4: - Updated to B18 1.1.3: - Updated to A17
